description:
Job Overview:

Join our team as an Agent where you will play a crucial role in our operations. As an Agent, you will be responsible for various tasks within our distribution center to ensure efficient order processing and shipment.

Essential Functions:

  • Prepare and coordinate documentation for efficient, cost-effective, and legal air export activities.
  • Coordinate and monitor cargo pick-up and transfer.
  • Communicate with export authorities, customers, and suppliers across relevant regions to ensure smooth operations.
  • Manage and update carrier/vendor rates; obtain spot rates as needed.
  • Communicate promptly with overseas agents and clients, including pre-alerts, rate requests, and shipment status updates.
  • Track shipments and provide status updates to customers and agents.
  • Create and maintain customer files.
  • Handle customer invoicing and approve payables.
  • Audit files for accuracy and completion.
  • Interact professionally and courteously with coworkers.
  • Enter data and manage documentation in JWS.
  • Assist other departments as needed or requested by management.

Qualifications:

  • 3-5 years of experience handling air shipments.
  • Spanish skills are a plus.
  • Knowledge of geography is preferred.
  • Team player with the ability to adapt to a dynamic work environment.
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills.
  • Proactive problem-solving with diplomacy.
  • Respectful interaction with management and coworkers.
  • Ability to perform duties without posing a threat to health or safety.
  • Positive and effective interaction with coworkers, subordinates, and supervisors.

Education/Experience:

  • Familiarity with Cargo Wise and experience in the freight forwarding industry are advantageous.

Company Description

Must be able to commute to job site.
